title: America’s First Marine Highway Comes Back to Life
description: Goldman’s biggest year on the New York Canal System coincided with the year that Enron failed. As it turned out, numerous, high value turbines had to be moved into storage. The shippers turned to Goldman and his fledgling operation.

title: Here's What 'The Wolf Of Wall Street' Teaches Us About Corporate Storytelling
description: Some corporations do acquire a collective identity that shapes their stories – Enron as the hubristic “smartest guys in the room” or Goldman Sachs as a “great vampire squid.” But these companies that take on such depictions are exceptions.
